name: Run (itch) (iwul841244877)
description:
In this game, you are being tracked in a different room. You have to run around the maze to find the key before the time runs out. 

There are total of 3 levels in the game. Try beats them in one time!

Control: 

1.WASD to move around

2.Hold Shift to run

3. Space to jump

4. ESC to quit
